import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb } from "@gull"; import LineChart4 from "app/views/charts/echarts/LineChart4"; import DoughnutChart from "app/views/charts/echarts/Doughnut"; import {Accordion, Card, Dropdown, ProgressBar, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import ReactPaginate from "react-paginate"; import SimpleCard from "@gull/components/cards/SimpleCard"; import { classList } from "@utils";
